definition: relating to or applicable to or concerned with the administration of a city or town or district rather than a larger area, public transport consisting of a bus or train that stops at all stations or stops
details:
adjective
- relating to or applicable to or concerned with the administration of a city or town or district rather than a larger area
= example: relating to or applicable to or concerned with the administration of a city or town or district rather than a larger area
- affecting only a restricted part or area of the body
= example: affecting only a restricted part or area of the body
- of or belonging to or characteristic of a particular locality or neighborhood
= example: of or belonging to or characteristic of a particular locality or neighborhood
noun
- public transport consisting of a bus or train that stops at all stations or stops
= example: public transport consisting of a bus or train that stops at all stations or stops
- anesthetic that numbs a particular area of the body
= synonyms: local anesthetic, local anaesthetic, topical anesthetic, topical anaesthetic
